content:
I am playing with rust in the last 3 months and now I wanna make a contribution on rust, actually when I was working on a crate I noticed that chaining of comparisons is not supported in rust and it was a little annoying for me and there is an issue for it from 2017 until now, so I decided to learn about rust core compiler and hopefully fix this issue, I am not sure that this is a very hard point to start or not, but
I hope that I will be able to fix it and then contribute more on rust :D
